languages.text: "Это же та "не-обращайте-на-меня-внимание" фрейлина, которую приставили к шерин! Похоже, она тоже потеряла Лорд-капитана... И здравый рассудок впридачу".
"Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."
languages.original_text: "Это же та "не-обращайте-на-меня-внимание" фрейлина, которую приставили к шерин! Похоже, она тоже потеряла Лорд-капитана... И здравый рассудок впридачу".

traits.locale_text: "Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."
"Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."
"Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."
"Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."
"Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."

languages.text: “这不是那个小小的侍女，负责侍奉我亲爱的吗？看来，她也被舰长大人迷住了……她的脑子也发了疯。”
languages.original_text: "Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."

traits.locale_text: “这不是那个小小的侍女，负责侍奉我亲爱的吗？看来，她也被舰长大人迷住了……她的脑子也发了疯。”

languages.text: «¿No es esta la vasalla que asignaron a mi shereen? Parece que ella también ha perdido {rt_mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán... junto con su cordura».
languages.original_text: "Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."

traits.locale_text: «¿No es esta la vasalla que asignaron a mi shereen? Parece que ella también ha perdido {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán... junto con su cordura».

languages.text: "Şirinimin yanına verilen o minik nedime değil mi bu? Görünüşe göre Lord Kaptan'ın yanı sıra akıl sağlığını da kaybetmiş."
languages.original_text: "Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."

traits.locale_text: "Şirinimin yanına verilen o minik nedime değil mi bu? Görünüşe göre Lord Kaptan'ın yanı sıra akıl sağlığını da kaybetmiş."

languages.text: 「アタシのシェリーンに割り当てられたおとなしい侍女ちゃんではないか？彼女はロード・キャプテンも…おまけに正気も失ったように見える」
languages.original_text: "Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."

traits.locale_text: 「アタシのシェリーンに割り当てられたおとなしい侍女ちゃんではないか？彼女はロード・キャプテンも…おまけに正気も失ったように見える」

languages.text: « N'est-ce pas là l'adorable dame d'honneur qui a été affectée à {rt_mf|mon|ma} shereen ? On dirait qu'elle a non seulement perdu {rt_mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}… mais aussi sa santé mentale. »
languages.original_text: "Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."

traits.locale_text: « N'est-ce pas là l'adorable dame d'honneur qui a été affectée à {rt_mf|mon|ma} shereen ? On dirait qu'elle a non seulement perdu {rt_mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}… mais aussi sa santé mentale. »

languages.text: "Ist das nicht die schüchterne Kammerzofe, die {rt_mf|meinem|meiner} Shereen zugeteilt war? Sie hat den Lord Captain wohl auch verloren ... und ihren Verstand gleich mit."
languages.original_text: "Isn't that the meek little lady-in-waiting that was assigned to my shereen? Looks like she's lost the Lord Captain too... and her sanity to boot."

traits.locale_text: "Ist das nicht die schüchterne Kammerzofe, die {rt_mf|meinem|meiner} Shereen zugeteilt war? Sie hat den Lord Captain wohl auch verloren ... und ihren Verstand gleich mit."
